data.title: City of Lompoc, CA BUSINESS LICENSES
data.meta_description: § 5.04.140C If such a determination is made, the Collector shall give a notice of the amount so assessed by serving it personally or by depositing it in the United States post office at Lompoc, California, postage prepaid, addressed to the person so assessed at his or
data.text:
October 1st through December 31st

3/4 of annual business tax

January 1st through March 31st

1/2 of annual business tax

April 1st through June 30th

1/4 of annual business tax
